description:
The following elements are included in the "Yohane the Parhelion" song set.

-"Yohane the Parhelion" song set
A song set that you can listen to!
Includes a total of 4 songs, comprising three tracks featured in 'Yohane the Parhelion -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR-' plus the theme song 'Deep Blue' from 'Yohane the Parhelion -BLAZE in the DEEPBLUE-'!

Additional songs can specify where you can play.
The settings are as follows.
-Title
-Fortune -Telling Shack
-Battle
-Boss Battle
Let's excite your favorite scenes with cool songs!

Recorded music
1. Genjitsu Mysterium
2. KIMINOTAMEBOKUNOTAME
3. Forever U & I
4. Deep Blue

* After purchasing "Yohane the Parhelion" song set,  setting item will be added to the setting screen.

* If multiple songs are specified at the same setting location, it will be played randomly.
name: "Yohane the Parhelion" song set
